disclaimer.user_tracking: This identifier will be used to suggest targeted advertising to you based on your interests.

error.dimissed_ad: Since you dismissed the ad early, you will not receive a reward. Please try again later.
error.failed_to_load_ad: Unable to load the ad. Please try again later.
error.no_ads_available: Currently, there are no ads available. Please check back later.

message.discover_other_app: Take a look at our other free apps!
message.enjoy_your_pdf_report_reward: Congratulations! Your PDF report is ready for download. Happy reading!
message.no_ads_now: No advertisements for now. Enjoy the application!

unlock.feature: Watch a short ad to unlock this feature!
unlock.feature_plural: Watch a short ad to unlock these features!
unlock.pdf: Watch a short ad to unlock the ability to export your data as a PDF!
